channel.title: Blogging on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on A Hugo website

item.title: Finding the right blogging platform
item.description: I’ve had a blog on blogger for a while now, where I have been wanting to document some of the things I have been doing in R recently. I write in RMarkDown a lot, and it would make sense if I could post directly to my blog from the .html files that are output from RStudio, but I’ve been struggling for a way to do it well. Blogger works in so far as you can copy all the code from the .
